detail_desc: Blouse in a jacquard weave made from a cupro blend with a frilled stand-up collar that has concealed buttons at the back. Long puff sleeves, frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs and a concealed zip at the back.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a stretchy shaft and covered block heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Cotton jersey vest tops with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Round earrings with long pendants decorated with a large bead and a smaller cube. Length 10.5 cm.
Thin, gold-plated metal rings in various designs.
Wide-fitting, calf-length dress in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with mesh at the back, mesh shoulder straps and a racer back.
Short, A-line skirt in a cotton weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Tunic in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Turban in a soft rib knit containing some wool.

Set with a bodysuit, trousers and hat in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with sewn-on ears.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Imitation leather slides. Two straps, one with a buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 1.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft printed jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Slipover in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, concealed pockets in the side seams, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Fitted fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Hood, zip down the front, thumbholes at the cuffs and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long, wide sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Knitted scarf in a soft wool and cashmere blend with a narrow ribbed trim at the ends.

V-neck jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with adjustable shoulder straps and a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, a concealed zip in one side and wide, ankle-length legs. Lined at the top.

Puffer jacket in a padded weave with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Longer, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, padded hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and flap front pockets with press-studs. Lined.
High-waisted, ankle-length, circular skirt in woven fabric. Wide, draped waistband with a wrapover front, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long sparkly stone earrings. Length approx. 10 cm.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede flap with a compartment and decoration on the front and magnetic fastener. Narrow shoulder strap at the top and card compartments inside. Lined. Size approx. 5x11x17 cm.
Sturdy hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross and have a lace section at the back, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Round-necked, soft jersey T-shirts in various designs. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
Fully lined swimsuit with a flounce at the top and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a welt seam around the soles and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and slim, straight legs.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Shirt in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell weave with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and smocked seam under the bust. Unlined.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, ribbed polo neck and jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with a patterned fabric band and flower appliqués at one side. Width of brim 4 cm. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short, straight-cut dress in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave containing glittery threads with a high, drawstring collar and zip at the top. Decorative seams with narrow trims in a contrasting colour and long, voluminous dolman sleeves with pleats and wide elastication at the cuffs. Drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and wide elastication at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a rounded collar, button placket and a gathered seam at the waist.
Long-sleeved all-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with press-stud fastenings.
Metal earrings in various designs, three pairs with fabric tassels.
Jumper in soft, airy, fine-knit merino wool with a small stand-up collar, decorative hole-knit sections, extra-long sleeves and roll edges around the collar, cuffs and hem.

Espadrilles with open sides, an adjustable strap with a metal buckle, elastication at the back, and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather linings and insoles, and fluted soles. Platform 4.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip in one side and seam at the waist. Gently flared skirt with decorative lace trims and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.

Trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sturdy, soft fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Boxy jacket in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, large buttons at the front, patch pockets with a flap and button and a concealed side pocket at the front. Dropped shoulders and straight sleeves with adjustable tabs and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.
Playsuit in soft washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck. Relaxed fit with a drawstring at the waist and wide legs with slits at the hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Striped short-sleeved top in slub jersey made from organic cotton with a round neck and rounded hem.
Jumper in rib-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Lined triangle bikini top with contrasting colour trims and gathered, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Jersey-lined trousers in cotton twill with embroidery. Elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.

Shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a deep V-neck front and back with pleats and covered buttons at the front. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a flared skirt that has a gathered seam half way down and is longer at the back. Partly lined.
Scarf in soft, fine-knit cashmere.
Oversized shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Elastic hairband with an appliqué at the front and elastication at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide foldover edge at the top, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Bag in imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 5x15x20 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, hole-patterned, functional fabric with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a pompom on top and a rib-knit foldover hem.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 3.5 cm.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and long sleeves. Opening at the back with a concealed zip at the bottom and a concealed button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a fitted skirt.
